snippet.title: Asphalt 3D  announcement trailer
snippet.description:
For more information visit http://3ds.ubi.com
The most renowned handheld racing series on handheld devices breaks through the 3rd dimension to tear up the streets on you Nintendo 3DS. See the track and opponents fly past your face like never before thanks to stereoscopic 3D technology that puts you in the driver's seat of amazing cars and motorcycles in races all over the globe.
